subNode:value.scalar:string: New modules and updates are displayed on the modules page.
Check the IP address on the cookie
Check the IP address of the cookie in order to prevent your cookie from being stolen.
Set the maximum size allowed for attachment files (in MegaBytes).
Define the limit upload for a downloadable product. This value has to be less than or equal to the maximum file upload allotted by your server.
Define the limit upload for an image. This value has to be less than or equal to the maximum file upload allotted by your server.
Allow yellow help boxes to be displayed under the form fields in the Back Office.
Hide optimization tips on the Back Office homepage
This will display notifications when new orders are made in your shop.
This will display notifications every time a new customer registers in your shop.
This will display notifications when new messages are posted in your shop.
The limit chosen is larger than the server's maximum upload limit. Please increase the limits of your server.
